actions.name: Psych Out

cost.trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.
Effect: All valid creatures within Range lose -1 SPATK stage for 5 activations. The user's Psychology Skill checks have an additional +10 bonus.

system.description:

Effect: All valid creatures within Range lose -1 SPATK stage for 5 activations. The user's Psychology Skill checks have an additional +10 bonus.
